text:
The swimsuit competition remains one of the most controversial parts of the pageant business — at least, that is, until someone flubs an answer in the Q&A round. To many, it's an archaic, ogle-centric spectacle reducing the contestants to their measurements, and sometimes a dodgy spray tan. But to many others (including the contestants themselves), it's an opportunity to showcase health and wellness, discipline, and a literal body of hard work.

Ahead of the 2018 Miss USA pageant, then, all 51 contestants bared their bikini bodies for the preliminary competition — click through to see them all onstage.

Related: See The 2018 Miss USA Contestants Competing In Their Evening Gowns!
authors: I M The News Director Here At Cosmopolitan.Com
I Could Really Use A Cup Of Tea Right Now.
